actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security

official_title: To amend section 1369 of title 18, United States Code, to extend Federal jurisdiction over destruction of veterans' memorials on State or local government property.
short_title: Protect our Veterans Memorials Act of 2005

summary.text: Protect our Veterans Memorials Act of 2005 - Amends the Federal criminal code to extend Federal jurisdiction over the destruction of veterans' memorials to such memorials on State or local government property.

titles.title: Protect our Veterans Memorials Act of 2005
To amend section 1369 of title 18, United States Code, to extend Federal jurisdiction over destruction of veterans' memorials on State or local government property.
